remediation: Upgrade microsoft/microsoft-graph to version 1.109.1, 2.0.0-RC5 or higher.
title: Information Exposure

vulnDescription.Overview: microsoft/microsoft-graph is a Microsoft Graph SDK for PHP Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Information Exposure via the tests/GetPhpInfo.php script which includes a call to the phpinfo() function. An attacker can obtain sensitive system information if the server is misconfigured to expose the tests under the /vendor directory.
vulnDescription.Workaround: This vulnerability can be mitigated by deleting the vendor/microsoft/microsoft-graph/tests/GetPhpInfo.php file, removing access to the /vendor directory, or disabling the phpinfo function.

source_code.diff:
@@ -1,3 +0,0 @@
-<?php
-
-phpinfo();
\ No newline at end of file
